segments.text: Hello , Jack . It ’ s Mary . What are you doing in your office ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m working . I often work late on Thursday . I ’ m busy this week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to come and have dinner with us on Friday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tomorrow ? No , I am afraid I won ’ t be able to . I ’ m going on business to Birmingham .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , I never go out on Saturday evening . I always watch football on Saturday evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will you come round next Tuesday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Next Tuesday ? Just a moment . It will be the twenty-first of May ? Oh , dear . Hum , I promised my aunt I ’ ll be at her birthday party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you say next Wednesday then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . Yes , Mary . Let ’ s make it next Wednesday .
segments.speaker: S1
